attributes.action: OBSERVE TUESDAY 11TH NOVEMBER 2008 AS A PUBLIC HOLIDAY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: NEXT YEAR 2008 SEES THE END OF THE FIRST WORLD WAR ON TUESDAY 11TH NOVEMBER. THIS SHOULD BE OBSERVED AS A NATIONAL HOLIDAY AND ALL REMEMBRANCE SERVICES TAKE PLACE ON THIS DAY.  ALL SHOPS ETC., WOULD CLOSE UNTIL 12AM (AS IN AUSTRALIA ON ANZAC DAY) AND THIS SHOULD BE IN PERPETUITY.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
